settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your AI providers and assign models to different tasks.

providers.title: AI Providers
providers.description: Configure your API keys and endpoints for different AI services.

emptyState.title: No providers configured.
emptyState.subtitle: Add a provider to get started.

providers.baseUrlHelp: The base URL of an OpenAI-compatible API (e.g., https://api.together.xyz/v1)

validation.baseUrlRequired: Base URL is required for OpenAI-compatible providers

models.fallbackModel: Used automatically in case of primary provider failure
models.noSuggestedProvider: No suggested provider for this task, but you can use
models.title: Model Configuration
models.description: Choose a mode: fast (single shared LLM) or advanced (per-task configuration).

noProviders.title: You must configure at least one provider
noProviders.subtitle: in the "AI Providers" tab.

llm.title: Global LLM model
llm.description: Used for Chat, Routing, Reflection, Summaries, and Analysis. Select one model for all.

embeddings.title: Embeddings (required)
embeddings.description: Vectorization for semantic search (Weaviate and summaries).

speech.title: Speech to Text
speech.description: Audio transcription to text (Whisper or equivalent).

warnings.mixed: Some tasks in this group use different models. Choose a provider to harmonize.
warnings.required: This group is required: select at least one provider and one model.

models.noRecommendedProvider: No recommended provider, but you can choose one and select a model manually.
models.noSuggestedProviderForTask: No suggested provider for this task, but you can choose any.
models.noSuggestedModel: No suggested model, but you can use any model.
models.noSuggestedModelForProvider: No suggested model for this provider; choose any available model.
models.selectProviderFirst: Choose a provider before selecting a model.

fallback.title: ‚ö° Fallback Configuration
fallback.description: Used automatically if the primary provider fails
fallback.optionalHint: Optional: configure a fallback for resilience

secrets.addApiKey: Add your API keys to use generated tools and
secrets.title: Secrets & API Keys
secrets.subtitle: Store your API keys and secrets securely with AES-256-GCM encryption.

emptyState.title: No secrets configured.
emptyState.subtitle: Add your API keys to use generated tools and MCP integration.

secrets.editDescription: Edit your API key or secret
secrets.keyHelp: Format: lowercase letters, numbers, underscores only
secrets.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Key to access GPT-4 API
secrets.valueWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Do not share this value. It is encrypted in the database.

validation.keyFormat: Key must start with a lowercase letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores

listening.title: Voice detection and silence settings
listening.voiceRecognition: Settings to recognize your voice among others
listening.confidenceThreshold: Confidence level required to confirm it's you speaking
listening.passiveMemory: Controls what is recorded in passive memory

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.memoryStoredHint: Notify when speech is saved to memory
notifications.commandDetectedHint: Notify when the wake word is recognized

listening.notifyWhenSaved: Notify when speech is saved to memory
listening.headerDescription: Configure continuous listening to automatically capture your thoughts and commands.

wakeWord.title: Wake Word
wakeWord.description: The word or phrase that triggers command mode
wakeWord.label: Wake word
wakeWord.help: Say this word before a command so the system responds actively
wakeWord.sensitivityHint: Increase to detect more variations of the wake word
wakeWord.passiveNote: This text will be treated as a passive observation

audioProcessing.title: Audio Processing
audioProcessing.description: Voice activity and silence detection settings
audioProcessing.vadHint: Voice activity detection: higher sensitivity detects quieter voices
audioProcessing.silenceHint: Silence duration before considering a phrase complete

speaker.title: Speaker Identification
speaker.description: Settings to recognize your voice among others
speaker.confidenceHint: Minimum confidence to confirm it is you speaking. Lower values accept more variations of your voice.

memory.title: Relevance Threshold
memory.description: Controls what is stored in passive memory
memory.minImportanceHint: Only speech above this relevance threshold is stored. Lower captures more; higher is more selective.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.subtitle: Choose a theme or follow your device preference.
appearance.description: Pick a color scheme that matches your workflow. The choice is stored in your preferences for future sessions.

descriptions.system: Automatically syncs with macOS, Windows, or Linux appearance.
descriptions.light: For a bright and airy interface with high contrast.
descriptions.dark: Keeps the workspace dark for low-light sessions.

chatgptOAuth.title: ChatGPT Account
chatgptOAuth.description: Use your ChatGPT subscription quota for API access

notConnected.title: Not Connected
notConnected.description: Connect your ChatGPT account to use your subscription quota instead of providing an API key. This is useful if you have a ChatGPT Plus or Team subscription.

benefits.noApiKey: No need to manage separate API keys

chatgptOAuth.useOAuthDescription: When enabled, uses your ChatGPT account for API requests
chatgptOAuth.noteDescription: ChatGPT OAuth provides an alternative to API keys. You can still configure regular API providers above, and choose which method to use per task.

mic.startAria: Click to record a voice message

page.title: Voice Training
page.subtitle: Create and train your voice profile for better recognition

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.tip1: Create a voice profile to begin training.
gettingStarted.tip2: Record a few short phrases to build your model.
gettingStarted.tip3: Read longer paragraphs for higher accuracy.

recordSamples.title: Record Voice Samples
recordSamples.subtitle: Record natural readings of the phrases below. Train with multiple languages for better accuracy.
recordSamples.languageTip: üí° Tip: Recording samples in multiple languages improves recognition when you switch languages
recordSamples.minimumSamples: Record at least 1 sample to continue.
tips: Record in a quiet environment for best results
Train with multiple languages for better multilingual recognition
Multiple recordings of the same phrase strengthen the model
Next: You'll read longer paragraphs for even better voice modeling

recordingControl.lowVolumeWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Volume is low - speak louder or move closer to microphone

errors.microphoneAccess: Unable to access microphone. Please check permissions.

profileSelection.title: Select or Create a Voice Profile
profileSelection.subtitle: You can create multiple profiles for different voices and train them independently. You can always add more samples to improve accuracy.
profileSelection.profileNamePlaceholder: e.g., Work Voice, Personal, Second Language
profileSelection.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? All voice samples and training data will be permanently removed.
tips: You can add more samples to a profile at any time to improve accuracy
Re-training with more samples will refine the voice model
Keep profiles organized by naming them descriptively

errors.microphoneAccess: Failed to access microphone. Please grant permission.

profileSetup.title: Create Your Speaker Profile
profileSetup.subtitle: Set up your profile to get started. This will be your unique voice identity in the system.
profileSetup.profileNameHint: Give your profile a memorable name
profileSetup.emailHint: Your account email (linked to your voice profile)

recentRecordings.title: Recent Audio Classifications
recentRecordings.subtitle: Review and correct speaker classifications from continuous listening
recentRecordings.whyReviewDescription: If the system incorrectly classified your voice as "someone else", it will avoid matching similar audio in the future. Correcting these helps improve accuracy.
recentRecordings.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all negative examples? This will reset the system's learning about other speakers.
recentRecordings.emptyDescription: Audio from continuous listening will appear here
recentRecordings.retrainingTriggered: ‚úì Voice sample added and retraining started automatically!
recentRecordings.sampleAdded: ‚úì Voice sample added to your profile
recentRecordings.confidenceHint: The system is {{percent}}% confident this classification is correct

actions.markAsOther: Mark this as someone else's voice

audio.sourceUnavailable: Audio source not available for this recording type.
audio.invalidFormat: Received data is not audio format. The audio file may have been deleted or corrupted.
audio.playFailed: Failed to play audio. The file may be corrupted.

setupStep1: Send /newbot to create a new bot
Choose a name for your bot (e.g., "My Second Brain")
Copy the token provided by BotFather
setupStep2: Paste your bot token above and click Connect Bot
Open your bot in Telegram (click the link BotFather gave you)
Your chat will be automatically connected!

notificationSettings.confirmDisconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect Telegram? You will stop receiving notifications.

pushover.description: Receive push notifications on your mobile devices

Install the Pushover app on your phone
Copy your User Key from your Pushover dashboard
Paste it above and click Save
Click Test to verify everything works

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description: Learn about your Second Brain AI System

aiConfig.title: AI Configuration
aiConfig.description: Set up your AI models and providers

modelSelection.title: Select LLM Model
modelSelection.description: Choose which model to use for your tasks

channels.title: Notification Channels
channels.description: Configure how you want to be notified

completion.title: All Set!
completion.description: Your system is ready to use

welcomeStep.title: Your Personal AI Operating System
welcomeStep.subtitle: Second Brain AI is designed to be your cognitive companion ‚Äî capturing, organizing, and helping you act on information throughout your life.

memorySystem.title: Memory System
memorySystem.description: Automatically captures and organizes your interactions, creating a searchable personal knowledge base.

aiConversations.title: AI Conversations
aiConversations.description: Chat with AI models that have access to your personal context and memory.

proactiveInsights.title: Proactive Insights
proactiveInsights.description: Get helpful suggestions and reminders based on your patterns and goals.

smartAutomation.title: Smart Automation
smartAutomation.description: Execute tasks and workflows with AI agents that understand your preferences.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: All your data stays local and private. You control what gets stored and processed.

timeSummaries.title: Time-based Summaries
timeSummaries.description: Automatic daily, weekly, and monthly summaries help you track progress and insights.

welcomeStep.gettingStartedCopy: We'll help you configure the essential settings to get your Second Brain AI system up and running. This includes setting up AI providers, notification preferences, and giving you a quick tour of the features.

aiConfigStep.title: Configure AI Models
aiConfigStep.subtitle: Add at least one AI provider to power your Second Brain. We recommend starting with OpenAI for the best experience.
aiConfigStep.securityCopy: Your API key is stored securely and only used to make requests to the AI provider.
aiConfigStep.helpCopy: You'll need an API key from an AI provider. Here are some popular options:

modelSelectionStep.title: Select Your LLM
modelSelectionStep.subtitle: Choose which language model you'd like to use for your Second Brain. You can change this later in settings.
modelSelectionStep.modelDescription: This model will be used for conversations, analysis, and reasoning tasks.
modelSelectionStep.noModelsFound: No models found. Please go back and verify your API key.
modelSelectionStep.tipDescription: Different models have different capabilities and speeds. For beginners, we recommend GPT-3.5 or similar. For advanced use cases, try GPT-4.

embeddingSelectionStep.title: Select Embedding Model
embeddingSelectionStep.subtitle: Choose an embedding model for semantic search and memory organization. This is required for the system to work properly.
embeddingSelectionStep.modelDescription: This model will be used to vectorize text for semantic search and memory retrieval.
embeddingSelectionStep.noModelsFound: No embedding models found. Please go back and verify your API key.
embeddingSelectionStep.tipDescription: Embedding models convert text into vectors for semantic search. text-embedding-3-small is recommended for most use cases.
embeddingSelectionStep.tipSecondary: The embedding model is essential for the system to work - it powers semantic search across your memories.

channelsStep.title: Set Up Notification Channels
channelsStep.subtitle: Choose how you'd like to receive notifications from your Second Brain AI. You can configure multiple channels or skip this step for now.

browser.title: Browser Notifications
browser.description: Get notifications directly in your browser while using the app

pushover.title: Pushover (Mobile)
pushover.description: Receive push notifications on your phone via the Pushover app

telegram.title: Telegram Bot
telegram.description: Get notifications through a private Telegram bot

channelsStep.configuredNoticeBody: All notification settings can be changed in the Settings page after setup is complete.

completionStep.title: üéâ Setup Complete!
completionStep.subtitle: Your Second Brain AI system is now configured and ready to help you capture, organize, and act on information throughout your day.

conversation.title: Start a Conversation
conversation.description: Open the Chat tab and start talking to your AI assistant

memory.title: Explore Memory Browser
memory.description: View how your interactions are being stored and organized

settings.title: Customize Settings
settings.description: Fine-tune AI models, notifications, and other preferences

docs.title: Read Documentation
docs.description: Learn about advanced features and capabilities

proTips: Use natural language - the AI understands context and intent
Check the Memory Browser to see how your data is organized
Explore the Settings to customize your experience
All your data is stored locally and privately
summaryBullets: Your conversations and interactions will be automatically captured
AI will generate daily and weekly summaries of your activity
Proactive insights will help you stay on track with goals and habits
You can search through your entire memory history at any time

errorFallback.title: This spark has encountered a runtime error
errorFallback.description: Something unexpected happened while running the application. The error details are shown below. Contact the spark author and let them know about this issue.

panel.title: Continuous Listening
panel.connectedDescription: The system is listening to your environment
panel.disconnectedDescription: Enable listening to capture your thoughts

notificationTest.title: Notifications
notificationTest.subtitle: Configure your notification channels and preferences. The system can reach you across multiple platforms.

testForm.title: Send Test Notification
testForm.selectChannel: Select a channel above to send a test notification

channels.title: Channels
channels.subtitle: Connect your favorite messaging platforms to receive alerts and notifications

emptyState.title: Select a channel to get started
emptyState.description: Click on one of the channels above to configure it and start receiving notifications

tasksScheduling.title: Tasks & Scheduling
tasksScheduling.subtitle: Manage your manual and automated tasks in one place

hero.subtitle: Capture your thoughts, conversations, and decisions. Let AI organize, summarize, and surface the right memories at the right time‚Äîall running locally on your machine.

memory.title: Continuous Memory
memory.description: Automatically captures interactions and structures them with semantic understanding. Everything is searchable by meaning, not just keywords.

voice.title: Speaker Recognition
voice.description: Train voice profiles with ECAPA-TDNN neural networks. Know who's speaking and filter out background noise automatically.

search.title: Semantic Search
search.description: Ask questions naturally. Find memories by meaning using vector embeddings. "What did I decide about the roadmap last week?"

proactive.title: Proactive Coach
proactive.description: Your personal AI coach analyzes patterns to help with health, productivity, and goals. Gentle nudges, never pushy.

summaries.title: Time-Scale Summaries
summaries.description: Daily insights become weekly patterns, monthly reviews, and yearly reflections. Knowledge compounds over time.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Self-hosted with encrypted storage. Zero telemetry. Your data never leaves your infrastructure.

aiModels.title: Any AI Model
aiModels.description: Use the best AI providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google Gemini. Or run models locally with Ollama, LM Studio, or any OpenAI-compatible endpoint for complete privacy.

tools.title: Tools & Skills
tools.description: Extend your AI with custom tools and skills. Browse the web, execute code, call APIs, automate tasks‚Äîall with built-in safety guardrails.
tools.examples: Web browsing, code execution, API calls, and more

howItWorks.title: From chaos to clarity
howItWorks.subtitle: A continuous loop that transforms raw interactions into actionable knowledge.

capture.title: Capture
capture.description: Voice, text, or API. Record thoughts, conversations, and decisions as they happen.

understand.title: Understand
understand.description: AI classifies intent, filters noise, and extracts meaning from every input.

remember.title: Remember
remember.description: Vectorized and indexed for instant semantic retrieval across any timeframe.

assist.title: Assist
assist.description: Proactive insights, contextual answers, and automated tasks when you need them.

proactive.title: An AI coach that actually helps
proactive.description: Runs twice daily to analyze your patterns and provide actionable suggestions. Monitors your wellbeing, tracks goals, and helps build better habits‚Äîall without being invasive.

sample1.title: Time for a break
sample1.desc: You've been working for 4 hours straight. Consider a 15-minute walk.

sample2.title: Goal milestone reached
sample2.desc: You've completed 80% of your Q1 reading goal. Keep it up!

sample3.title: Habit streak: 7 days
sample3.desc: Your morning routine is becoming consistent. Great progress!

timeline.title: Knowledge that compounds
timeline.subtitle: Daily context becomes long-term insight through a cascade of intelligent summaries.

quickStart.title: Up and running in 60 seconds
quickStart.subtitle: Clone, setup, and launch. Docker handles the rest.

features.title: Everything you need for a second brain
features.subtitle: Built for privacy-conscious users who want AI assistance without compromising their data.

list.aiModelsFlexible: OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, or local models

footer.copyright: Open source under MIT License. Built for humans who value their privacy.
